reviews.description: I made the Honey Garlic Salmon the other night...sooo delicious and was able to use almost only ingredients I already had in my kitchen. Even the kids loved it!
OMG made the Meditteranean Pasta Salad for a date night activity and it was such a fun activity for my partner and I to do together :) 5 stars for sure
Subbed mushrooms for pork in the hot and sour soup to make it vegetarian...surprised by how good it was
5 WORDS: Roast fennel and aubergine paella. Keep hunting until you get the recipe. Trust me
